typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Client ID} as string,
		{Dealer ID} as string,
		{Vehicle Type} as string,
		{Registration Number} as string,
		{Stock Number} as string,
		{Group Date in Stock} as string,
		{Dealership Date In Stock} as string,
		Status as string,
		{New Or Used} as string,
		Chassis as string,
		{Registration Date} as string,
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Derivative as string,
		Trim as string,
		{Engine Size} as string,
		Bodystyle as string,
		Odometer as integer,
		{Odometer Type} as string,
		FuelType as string,
		Transmission as string,
		{Generic Colour} as string,
		Doors as string,
		{Stock Value} as string,
		Vat as string,
		Source as string,
		{Vehicle Catagory Code} as string,
		{Retail Price} as string,
		{Purchaser ID} as string,
		Supplier as string,
		{Group Purchase Date} as string,
		{Available Date} as string,
		{Progress Code} as string,
		Reconditioning as string,
		{Transport Costs} as string,
		{Adjusted Stock Value} as string,
		{Received Date} as string,
		{Purchase Account} as string,
		{Quarantine Status} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	rowUrlColumn: 'FileName',
	dateFormats: ['dd/MM/yyyy'],
	wildcardPaths:['*/vehiclestock-*.csv']) ~> VehicleStock
VehicleStock sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ClientID as integer,
		DealershipID as string,
		Type as string,
		RegistrationNo as string,
		StockNo as string,
		GroupDateInStock as date,
		DealershipDateInStock as date,
		Status as string,
		NewOrUsed as string,
		Chassis as string,
		FirstRegisteredDate as date,
		Make as string,
		Model as string,
		Derivative as string,
		Trim as string,
		EngineSize as string,
		Bodystyle as string,
		Mileage as integer,
		FuelType as string,
		Transmission as string,
		GenericColour as string,
		SpecificColour as string,
		Doors as integer,
		SIV as double,
		Vat as string,
		Source as string,
		ModelAnalysisCode as string,
		RetailPrice as double,
		Purchaser as string,
		SupplierName as string,
		PurchaseInvoiceDate as date,
		AvailableDate as date,
		ProgressCode as string,
		Recon as double,
		TransportCosts as double,
		AdjustedSIV as double,
		ReceivedDate as date,
		DateInGroup as date,
		PurchaseAccount as string,
		QuarantineStatus as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ClientID,
		DealershipID,
		Type,
		RegistrationNo,
		StockNo,
		GroupDateInStock,
		DealershipDateInStock,
		Status,
		NewOrUsed,
		Chassis,
		FirstRegisteredDate,
		Make,
		Model,
		Derivative,
		Trim,
		EngineSize,
		Bodystyle,
		Mileage,
		FuelType,
		Transmission,
		GenericColour,
		SpecificColour,
		Doors,
		SIV,
		Vat,
		Source,
		ModelAnalysisCode,
		RetailPrice,
		Purchaser,
		SupplierName,
		PurchaseInvoiceDate,
		AvailableDate,
		ProgressCode,
		Recon,
		TransportCosts,
		AdjustedSIV,
		ReceivedDate,
		DateInGroup,
		PurchaseAccount,
		QuarantineStatus
	)) ~> SQLVehicleStock
